=== Desktop Support ===

Summary

Provide general support and advice to local ubuntu desktop users via irc (#ubuntu-tt on freenode).

Involves:
* Hanging out on #ubuntu-tt, Facebook, forums etc.
* Helps troubleshoot other user's problems.
* Maintain a 'nice person' profile.
